text: If you're reading this book, you've probably found and uncovered an ancient tome.
Since you now have access to magical texts, you can start down the path to learning how to create and cast new magicks of your own!
Try getting started by checking out $(l:basics/subjects)Subjects$(/l)

pages.title: The Basics
pages.text: Continue through the "The Basics" category to learn the basics of reading and casting in Scriptor Magicae.
